docs.lead_paragraph: When Paul Ryan, speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives, talks of social mobility, about helping struggling Americans move out of impoverished areas to give them greater opportunity, Shiva Daniels is the kind of person he has in mind.

headline.print_headline: Out in the Cold: New U.S. Budget Priorities Threaten Housing Aid Programs
headline.main: Out in the Cold: New U.S. Budget Priorities Threaten Housing Aid Programs

docs.snippet: When Paul Ryan, speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives, talks of social mobility, about helping struggling Americans move out of impoverished areas to give them greater opportunity, Shiva Daniels is the kind of person he has in mind....

docs.lead_paragraph: Australia are hoping to chase as little as they can in their fourth innings against India on a difficult pitch, opener Matt Renshaw said on Sunday, adding that the touring side were content with having batted for the entire second day.

headline.print_headline: Australia Content Having Batted Entire Day, Says Renshaw
headline.main: Australia Content Having Batted Entire Day, Says Renshaw

docs.snippet: Australia are hoping to chase as little as they can in their fourth innings against India on a difficult pitch, opener Matt Renshaw said on Sunday, adding that the touring side were content with having batted for the entire second day....

docs.lead_paragraph: An Associated Press review of Neil Gorsuch's (GOR'-suhch's) rulings as a federal judge finds that the Supreme Court nominee has shown a willingness to limit the participation of environmental groups in lawsuits involving public lands.

headline.print_headline: Gorsuch Willing to Limit Environmental Groups in Land Cases
headline.main: Gorsuch Willing to Limit Environmental Groups in Land Cases

docs.snippet: An Associated Press review of Neil Gorsuch's (GOR'-suhch's) rulings as a federal judge finds that the Supreme Court nominee has shown a willingness to limit the participation of environmental groups in lawsuits involving public lands....

docs.lead_paragraph: Senior French conservative politicians will propose an alternative to presidential candidate Francois Fillon, a senior politician from The Republicans party said, suggesting that Alain Juppe was the only option.

headline.print_headline: French Conservative Party Heavyweights to Push for Fillon Alternative, Says Senior Politician
headline.main: French Conservative Party Heavyweights to Push for Fillon Alternative, Says Senior Politician

docs.snippet: Senior French conservative politicians will propose an alternative to presidential candidate Francois Fillon, a senior politician from The Republicans party said, suggesting that Alain Juppe was the only option....

docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis on Sunday called on people to carry and read the bible with as much dedication as they do their mobile phones.

headline.print_headline: Pope Says Carry and Read Bible as if It Were a Mobile Phone
headline.main: Pope Says Carry and Read Bible as if It Were a Mobile Phone

docs.snippet: Pope Francis on Sunday called on people to carry and read the bible with as much dedication as they do their mobile phones....

docs.lead_paragraph: As millions of Americans file their income tax returns, their chances of getting audited by the IRS have rarely been so low.

headline.print_headline: Income Tax Audits Plummet as IRS Loses Agents to Budget Cuts
headline.main: Income Tax Audits Plummet as IRS Loses Agents to Budget Cuts

docs.snippet: As millions of Americans file their income tax returns, their chances of getting audited by the IRS have rarely been so low....

docs.lead_paragraph: Russian news reports say curious and pious people are visiting a bust of the last czar in the Crimean capital after reports spread that the sculpture appeared to be weeping.

headline.print_headline: Czar Bust in Crimea Reportedly Appears to Shed Tears
headline.main: Czar Bust in Crimea Reportedly Appears to Shed Tears

docs.snippet: Russian news reports say curious and pious people are visiting a bust of the last czar in the Crimean capital after reports spread that the sculpture appeared to be weeping....

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican leaders in Maine and Utah are asking President Donald Trump to step into uncharted territory and rescind national monument designations made by his predecessor.

headline.print_headline: Republicans in Maine, Utah Want Trump to Undo Monuments
headline.main: Republicans in Maine, Utah Want Trump to Undo Monuments

docs.snippet: Republican leaders in Maine and Utah are asking President Donald Trump to step into uncharted territory and rescind national monument designations made by his predecessor....

docs.lead_paragraph: Deniz Yucel, a German-Turkish journalist arrested last week in Turkey, views his solitary confinement in Turkey as "almost a form of torture," but said his health and mental condition are good, the German newspaper he reports for said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Journalist Says in Solitary Confinement in Turkey: Newspaper
headline.main: Journalist Says in Solitary Confinement in Turkey: Newspaper

docs.snippet: Deniz Yucel, a German-Turkish journalist arrested last week in Turkey, views his solitary confinement in Turkey as "almost a form of torture," but said his health and mental condition are good, the German newspaper he reports for said on Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Theresa May will write to European Council President Donald Tusk this month [L5N1GG31G] to trigger Britain's withdrawal from the European Union under Article 50 of the EU treaty.
